mc.name: Bosium Strip
mc.oracleText: {3}, {T}: Until end of turn, if the top card in your graveyard is an instant or sorcery card, you may play that card. If a card played this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.
mc.printedText: {3}, {T}: Until end of turn, if at any time the top card in your graveyard is an instant, interrupt, or sorcery card, you may play that card as though it were in your hand. If you do so, remove the card from the game.

mc.name: Bubble Matrix
mc.oracleText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures.
mc.printedText: All damage dealt to creatures is reduced to 0.
mc.flavorText:
"This device was commisioned by a king who desired peace. Unfortunately, the royal artificer was also the king's jester."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Chimeric Sphere
mc.oracleText:
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 2/1 Construct artifact creature with flying.
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 3/2 Construct artifact creature without flying.
mc.printedText:
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere is a 2/1 artifact creature with flying.
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere is a 3/2 artifact creature without flying.

mc.name: Dingus Staff
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, Dingus Staff deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
mc.printedText: Whenever a creature is put into any graveyard from play, Dingus Staff deals 2 damage to that creature's controller.
mc.flavorText:
"A sharp conscience is the weapon of the soul."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Jabari's Banner
mc.oracleText: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains flanking until end of turn. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText: {1}, {T}: Target creature gains flanking until end of turn. (Whenever a creature without flanking is assigned to block this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

mc.name: Jangling Automaton
mc.oracleText: Whenever Jangling Automaton attacks, untap all creatures defending player controls.
mc.printedText: If Jangling Automaton attacks, untap all creatures defending player controls.
mc.flavorText:
"We always look upon our first creations as masterpieces, no matter how awful they are."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Mana Web
mc.oracleText: Whenever a land an opponent controls is tapped for mana, tap all lands that player controls that can produce any type of mana that land could produce.
mc.printedText: Whenever any land target opponent controls is tapped for mana, tap all lands he or she controls that can produce any type of mana that land can produce.

mc.name: Mind Stone
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. Play this ability as a mana source.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

mc.name: Null Rod
mc.oracleText: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be played.
mc.printedText: Players cannot play any artifact abilities requiring an activation cost.
mc.flavorText:
Gerrard: "But it doesn't do anything"
Hanna: "No--it does nothing."

mc.name: Phyrexian Furnace
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Remove the bottom card of target player's graveyard from the game.
{1}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Remove target card in a graveyard from the game. Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Remove the bottom card of target player's graveyard from the game.
{1}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Remove target card in any graveyard from the game and draw a card.

mc.name: Serrated Biskelion
mc.oracleText: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Steel Golem
mc.oracleText: You can't play creature spells.
mc.printedText: You cannot play summon or artifact creature spells.
mc.flavorText:
"Although I would give my life to protect Gerrard, my conscience will not let me take another's. There are many who would not hesitate."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Straw Golem
mc.oracleText: When an opponent plays a creature spell, sacrifice Straw Golem.
mc.printedText: If any opponent successfully casts a summon or artifact creature spell, bury Straw Golem.
mc.flavorText:
"Don't look at me. I didn't build it."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Thran Forge
mc.oracleText: {2}: Until end of turn, target nonartifact creature gets +1/+0 and becomes an artifact in addition to its other types.
mc.printedText: {2}: Until end of turn, target nonartifact creature gets +1/+0 and is an artifact creature.
mc.flavorText: "This will work," Gerrard called to the elves as he used the forge to strengthen the aboroth, "but if it doesn't, we won't survive to care."

mc.name: Thran Tome
mc.oracleText: {5}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent chooses one of those cards. Put that card into your graveyard, then draw two cards.
mc.printedText: {5}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library to target opponent. Bury one of those cards of that opponent's choice. Draw the remaining cards.
mc.flavorText: Every line holds a tale, and between lie a thousand more.

mc.name: Touchstone
mc.oracleText: {T}: Tap target artifact you don't control.
mc.printedText: {T}: Tap target artifact you do not control.
mc.flavorText:
"One touch to the stone and the sidar's son turned me from stalwart to statue."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Well of Knowledge
mc.oracleText: {2}: Draw a card. Any player may play this ability but only during his or her draw step.
mc.printedText: Any player may pay {2} during his or her draw phase to draw a card. Players may use this ability as many times as they choose.

mc.name: Xanthic Statue
mc.oracleText: {5}: Until end of turn, Xanthic Statue becomes an 8/8 Golem artifact creature with trample.
mc.printedText: {5}: Until end of turn, Xanthic Statue is an 8/8 artifact creature with trample.
mc.flavorText:
"Until you have lived as a statue, do not talk to me of pigeons."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
mc.oracleText: When Abyssal Gatekeeper is put into a graveyard from play, each player sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: If Abyssal Gatekeeper is put into any graveyard from play, each player chooses and buries a creature he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Agonizing Memories
mc.oracleText: Look at target player's hand and choose two cards from it. Put them on top of that player's library in any order.
mc.printedText: Look at target player's hand. Choose two of those cards and put them on top of his or her library in any order.
mc.flavorText:
"An innocent man died because of my anger. That knowledge will haunt me for all eternity."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Barrow Ghoul
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Barrow Ghoul unless you remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game or bury Barrow Ghoul.
mc.flavorText:
"They killed my family to deny me a future. They fed on my ancestors to deny me a past."
--Crovax

mc.name: Bone Dancer
mc.oracleText: Whenever Bone Dancer attacks and isn't blocked, you may put the top creature card from defending player's graveyard into play under your control. If you do, Bone Dancer deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: {0}: Put the top creature card of defending player's graveyard into play under your control. Bone Dancer deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Bone Dancer is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.

mc.name: Buried Alive
mc.oracleText: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for up to three creature cards and put them into your graveyard. Shuffle your library afterwards.
mc.flavorText:
"Is it worse to walk while dead, or to be buried alive? I have witnessed both."
--Crovax

mc.name: Circling Vultures
mc.oracleText:
Flying
You may discard Circling Vultures any time you could play an instant.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Circling Vultures unless you remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game.
mc.printedText:
Flying
During your upkeep, remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game or bury Circling Vultures.
If Circling Vultures is in your hand, you may discard it. Play this ability as an instant.

mc.name: Coils of the Medusa
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/-1.
Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +1/-1.
Sacrifice Coils of the Medusa: Destroy all non-Wall creatures blocking enchanted creature.
mc.flavorText: Serpentine locks shape ornate rocks.

mc.name: Doomsday
mc.oracleText: Search your library and graveyard for five cards and remove the rest from the game. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.
mc.printedText: Pay half your life, rounded up: Put your graveyard on top of your library, then remove all but five cards of your library from the game. Put the rest on top of your library in any order.

mc.name: Fatal Blow
mc.oracleText: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. It can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: Bury target creature that was damaged this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"What is crueler? To let a wound of the heart fester, or to simply cut it out?"
--Crovax

mc.name: Festering Evil
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

{B}{B}, Sacrifice Festering Evil: Festering Evil deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, Festering Evil deals 1 damage to each creature and player.
{B}{B}, Sacrifice Festering Evil: Festering Evil deals 3 damage to each creature and player.

mc.name: Fledgling Djinn
mc.oracleText:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Flying
During your upkeep, Fledgling Djinn deals 1 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
"The young can be quite dangerous. Trust me, I should know."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Gallowbraid
mc.oracleText:
Trample
Cumulative upkeep-Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
mc.printedText:
Trample
Cumulative upkeep--1 life
mc.flavorText:
"If its skin looks like stone, it is only to match its heart."
--Crovax

mc.name: Haunting Misery
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Haunting Misery, remove X creature cards in your graveyard from the game.
Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player.
mc.printedText: Remove X creature cards in your graveyard from the game: Haunting Misery deals X damage to target player.
mc.flavorText:
"I am condemned without end."
--Crovax

mc.name: Hidden Horror
mc.oracleText: When Hidden Horror comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.
mc.printedText: When Hidden Horror comes into play, choose and discard a creature card or bury Hidden Horror.
mc.flavorText: Lifespans are measured by its dreadful length.

mc.name: Infernal Tribute
mc.oracleText: {2}, Sacrifice a nontoken permanent: Draw a card.
mc.printedText: {2}, Sacrifice a card in play: Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"I would not barter my soul for any of the filth that they called power. So they took it from me and damned me to solitude."
--Crovax

mc.name: Mischievous Poltergeist
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Pay 1 life: Regenerate Mischievous Poltergeist.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Pay 1 life: Regenerate
mc.flavorText:
"The past is a ghost that haunts you from the moment it exists until the moment you don't."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Morinfen
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep-Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cumulative upkeep--1 life
mc.flavorText:
"I looked into its eyes, and its soul was so empty I saw no reflection, no light there."
--Crovax

mc.name: Necratog
mc.oracleText: Remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game: Necratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game: +2/+2 until end of turn
mc.flavorText: The necratog can always dig up a meal.

mc.name: Odylic Wraith
mc.oracleText:
Swampwalk
Whenever Odylic Wraith deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
mc.printedText:
Swampwalk
If Odylic Wraith damages any player, that player chooses and discards a card.
mc.flavorText: By the time you've seen it, you won't remember that you did.

mc.name: Razortooth Rats
mc.oracleText: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
mc.printedText: Razortooth Rats cannot be blocked except by artifact creatures and black creatures.
mc.flavorText:
"Men and rats both hunger: we for our playthings; they, for us."
--Crovax

mc.name: Shadow Rider
mc.oracleText: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
mc.printedText: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking is assigned to block this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)
mc.flavorText: In its world of complete darkness, it has no shadows to fear.

mc.name: Shattered Crypt
mc.oracleText: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You lose X life.
mc.printedText: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand and lose X life.
mc.flavorText:
"You must be mad to want one such as I aboard the Weatherlight. But I would be mad to remain here with my rotting family. I accept."
--Crovax

mc.name: Spinning Darkness
mc.oracleText:
You may remove the top three black cards in your graveyard from the game rather than pay Spinning Darkness's mana cost.

Spinning Darkness deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
mc.printedText: You may remove the top three black cards in your graveyard from the game instead of paying Spinning Darkness's casting cost. Spinning Darkness deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. Gain 3 life.

mc.name: Strands of Night
mc.oracleText: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a Swamp: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: {B}{B}, Pay 2 life, Sacrifice a swamp: Put target creature card from your graveyard into play.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen the night torn into thin darkling strips and woven into shapes too bleak for dreams."
--Crovax

mc.name: Tendrils of Despair
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Tendrils of Despair, sacrifice a creature.
Target opponent discards two cards.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a creature: Target opponent chooses and discards two cards.
mc.flavorText:
"Because I am incapable of tears does not mean I have no need to shed them."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Urborg Justice
mc.oracleText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature for each creature put into your graveyard from play this turn.
mc.printedText: Target opponent chooses and buries a number of creatures he or she controls equal to the number of creatures put into your graveyard from play so far this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"It is a narrow line between justice and vengeance."
--Crovax

mc.name: Urborg Stalker
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player controls a nonblack, nonland permanent, Urborg Stalker deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.printedText: During each player's upkeep, if that player controls any nonblack permanents other than lands, Urborg Stalker deals 1 damage to that player.
mc.flavorText:
"May you be a stalker's dream."
--Urborg curse

mc.name: Wave of Terror
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the beginning of your draw step, destroy each creature with converted mana cost equal to the number of age counters on Wave of Terror. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
At the end of your upkeep, bury each creature with casting cost equal to Wave of Terror's last paid cumulative upkeep.
mc.flavorText: The sea of fear has endless depths.

mc.name: Zombie Scavengers
mc.oracleText: Remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game: Regenerate Zombie Scavengers.
mc.printedText: Remove the top creature card in your graveyard from the game: Regenerate
mc.flavorText:
"Pick a shell upon my shore and put it to your ear. That sound isn't the sea, but the whispers of the fallen."
--Crovax

mc.name: Abduction
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
When Abduction comes into play, untap enchanted creature.
You control enchanted creature.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that card to play under its owner's control.
mc.printedText:
When Abduction comes into play, untap enchanted creature.
Gain control of enchanted creature.
If enchanted creature is put into any graveyard, put that creature into play under its owner's control.

mc.name: Abjure
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Abjure, sacrifice a blue permanent.

Counter target spell.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice a blue permanent: Counter target spell.
mc.flavorText: Mirri's hackles rose as Ertai continued expounding his virtues. "If that arrogant brat doesn't shut up soon," she growled to herself, "I'm going to have to kill him."

mc.name: Ancestral Knowledge
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
When Ancestral Knowledge comes into play, look at the top ten cards of your library, then remove any number of them from the game and put the rest back on top of your library in any order.
When Ancestral Knowledge leaves play, shuffle your library.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
When Ancestral Knowledge comes into play, look at the top ten cards of your library, then remove any number of them from the game and put the rest back on top of your library in any order.
If Ancestral Knowledge leaves play, shuffle your library.

mc.name: Apathy
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may discard a card at random. If he or she does, untap that creature.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature does not untap during its controller's untap phase.
During the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player may discard a card at random to untap that creature.

mc.name: Argivian Restoration
mc.oracleText: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText: Put target artifact card from your graveyard into play.
mc.flavorText:
"The Argivian University taught me two things: always look to the past, and never dismiss what appears useless."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Avizoa
mc.oracleText:
Flying
{0}: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You skip your next untap step. Play this ability only once each turn.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Skip your next untap phase: Avizoa gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Use this ability only once each turn.
mc.flavorText: "Maybe we can trap them with bait," thought Tahngarth, eyeing Squee.

mc.name: Cloud Djinn
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.
mc.printedText:
Flying
Cloud Djinn can block only creatures with flying.
mc.flavorText:
As elusive as the footprint of a djinn
--Suq'Ata expression

mc.name: Disrupt
mc.oracleText:
Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Counter target instant, interrupt, or sorcery spell unless its caster pays an additional {1}.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText: Oh, I'm sorry--did I break your concentration?

mc.name: Ertai's Familiar
mc.oracleText:
Phasing
When Ertai's Familiar phases out or leaves play, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
{U}: Until your next upkeep, Ertai's Familiar can't phase out.
mc.printedText:
Phasing
If Ertai's Familiar leaves play, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.
{U}: Ertai's Familiar cannot phase out until the beginning of your next upkeep.

mc.name: Flux
mc.oracleText:
Each player discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Each player chooses and discards any number of cards, then draws that many cards.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"Every spell has the potential to be worthless."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Fog Elemental
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, sacrifice it at end of combat.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If Fog Elemental attacks or blocks, bury it at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"I've seen fog so thick you could cut it, but none that could cut me."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Mana Chains
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep {1}."
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gains "Cumulative upkeep {1}."
mc.flavorText:
"The Lord of the Wastes must be destroyed; I am bound to this destiny by the chains of fate. If only Gerrard would see his part."
--Sisay, journal

mc.name: Manta Ray
mc.oracleText:
Manta Ray can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Manta Ray can't be blocked except by blue creatures.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Manta Ray.
mc.printedText:
Islandhome (If defending player controls no islands, this creature cannot attack. If you control no islands, bury this creature.)
Manta Ray cannot be blocked except by blue creatures.

mc.name: Merfolk Traders
mc.oracleText: When Merfolk Traders comes into play, draw a card, then discard a card.
mc.printedText: When Merfolk Traders comes into play, draw a card, then choose and discard a card.
mc.flavorText:
"As much as I hate water, I do love fish . . . ."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Noble Benefactor
mc.oracleText: When Noble Benefactor is put into a graveyard from play, each player may search his or her library for a card and put that card into his or her hand. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
mc.printedText: If Noble Benefactor is put into any graveyard from play, each player may search his or her library for any one card and put that card into his or her hand. Each player who searches his or her library shuffles it afterwards.

mc.name: Ophidian
mc.oracleText: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: {0}: Draw a card. Ophidian deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Ophidian is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.

mc.name: Paradigm Shift
mc.oracleText: Remove all cards in your library from the game. Then shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText: Remove all cards in your library from the game. Shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.flavorText:
"Barrin always said that reality is relative. --'The world,' he cautioned, --'is but pieces of one's perception.'"
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Pendrell Mists
mc.oracleText: All creatures have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay {1}."
mc.printedText: Each creature gains "During your upkeep, pay {1} or bury this creature."
mc.flavorText: As insubstantial--and as insistent--as appetite.

mc.name: Phantom Warrior
mc.oracleText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.printedText: Phantom Warrior is unblockable.
mc.flavorText:
"Fishtails infest the water, and mists walk the land. Give me simple solid rock any day."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Phantom Wings
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gains flying.
Sacrifice Phantom Wings: Return enchanted creature to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText: "But you said --'when goats fly'" Squee whined.

mc.name: Psychic Vortex
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep-Draw a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
At the end of your turn, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep--Draw a card
At the end of each of your turns, sacrifice a land and discard your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Tolaria floats upon a wheel of fortune."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Relearn
mc.oracleText: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Return target instant, interrupt, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"Barrin taught me that the hardest lessons to grasp are the ones you've already learned."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Sage Owl
mc.oracleText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
When Sage Owl comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
mc.printedText:
Flying
When Sage Owl comes into play, look at the top four cards of your library and put them back in any order.
mc.flavorText: The owl asks but never answers.

mc.name: Teferi's Veil
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature you control attacks, it phases out at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"I don't like to speak ill of 'walkers . . . but just what did Teferi think he was doing?"
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Timid Drake
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When another creature comes into play, return Timid Drake to its owner's hand.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If any other creature comes into play, return Timid Drake to owner's hand.
mc.flavorText:
"I sneezed, and it bolted."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Tolarian Drake
mc.oracleText: Flying, phasing
mc.printedText: Flying, phasing
mc.flavorText: Many have been lost just in staring at its wings. What's seen differs from account to account, but madness is always part of the story.

mc.name: Tolarian Entrancer
mc.oracleText: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer becomes blocked by a creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: Whenever Tolarian Entrancer is blocked by any creature, gain control of that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"Why should I boast? The bards will do it for me--and with music."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Tolarian Serpent
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, put the top seven cards of your library into your graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"When the fishtails' threats of magic didn't move me, they set their pet on us."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Vodalian Illusionist
mc.oracleText: {U}{U}, {T}: Target creature phases out.
mc.printedText: {U}{U}, {T}: Target creature phases out.
mc.flavorText:
"Torahn gore these shifty fishtails You can't even get close to one."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Aboroth
mc.oracleText: Cumulative upkeep-Put a -1/-1 counter on Aboroth. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
mc.printedText: Cumulative upkeep--Put a -1/-1 counter on Aboroth
mc.flavorText: The Weatherlight banked sharply as the colossal beast rose up to crush the lone rider. "My bet's on the dirt," Gerrard said flatly.

mc.name: Arctic Wolves
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Arctic Wolves comes into play, draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {2}
When Arctic Wolves comes into play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"No matter where we cat warriors go in the world, those stupid slobberers find us."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Barishi
mc.oracleText: When Barishi is put into a graveyard from play, remove Barishi from the game, then shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText: If Barishi is put into any graveyard from play, remove Barishi from the game, then shuffle all creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

mc.name: Blossoming Wreath
mc.oracleText: You gain life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
mc.printedText: Gain life equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
"I place this wreath for you, my kin. Even in death, you give me strength to avenge you."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Briar Shield
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Sacrifice Briar Shield: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: In all its forms, the forest is the elves' best protector.

mc.name: Call of the Wild
mc.oracleText: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
mc.printedText: {2}{G}{G}: Reveal the top card of your library to all players. If that card is a creature card, put it into play. Otherwise, bury it.
mc.flavorText: Thinking of dinner made Squee realize that the forest was probably thinking the same thing.

mc.name: Choking Vines
mc.oracleText:
Play Choking Vines only during the declare blockers step.
X target attacking creatures become blocked. Choking Vines deals 1 damage to each of those creatures. (This spell works on unblockable creatures.)
mc.printedText:
Play only when blockers are declared.
X target attacking creatures are considered blocked. Choking Vines deals 1 damage to each of those creatures.

mc.name: Dense Foliage
mc.oracleText: Creatures can't be the targets of spells.
mc.printedText: Creatures cannot be the target of spells.
mc.flavorText:
"Big plants not only good for hidin', but full o' tasty bugs, too."
--Squee, goblin cabin hand

mc.name: Downdraft
mc.oracleText:
{G}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

Sacrifice Downdraft: Downdraft deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
mc.printedText:
{G}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.
Sacrifice Downdraft: Downdraft deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

mc.name: Fallow Wurm
mc.oracleText: When Fallow Wurm comes into play, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.
mc.printedText: When Fallow Wurm comes into play, choose and discard a land card or bury Fallow Wurm.
mc.flavorText:
The wurm's wake
--Elvish expression meaning
"ruined crops"

mc.name: Familiar Ground
mc.oracleText: Each creature you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.
mc.printedText: Each creature you control cannot be blocked by more than one creature.
mc.flavorText:
"I'd rather fight on foreign soil. That way, if I lose I can blame it on the terrain."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Fungus Elemental
mc.oracleText: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Put a +2/+2 counter on Fungus Elemental. Play this ability only if Fungus Elemental came into play this turn.
mc.printedText: {G}, Sacrifice a forest: Put a +2/+2 counter on Fungus Elemental. Use this ability only if Fungus Elemental came into play this turn.
mc.flavorText:
I rot growth and grow rot. What am I?
--Elvish riddle

mc.name: Gaea's Blessing
mc.oracleText:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Draw a card.
When Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.
mc.printedText:
Target player shuffles up to three target cards from his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Draw a card.
If Gaea's Blessing is put into your graveyard from your library, shuffle your graveyard into your library.

mc.name: Harvest Wurm
mc.oracleText: When Harvest Wurm comes into play, sacrifice it unless you return a basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: When Harvest Wurm comes into play, return any basic land card from your graveyard to your hand or bury Harvest Wurm.
mc.flavorText:
The wurm's weave
--Elvish expression meaning
"plowed fields"

mc.name: Liege of the Hollows
mc.oracleText: When Liege of the Hollows is put into a graveyard from play, each player may pay any amount of mana. Then each player puts into play a number of 1/1 green Squirrel creature tokens equal to the amount of mana he or she paid this way.
mc.printedText: If Liege of the Hollows is put into any graveyard from play, each player may pay any amount of mana to put that number of Squirrel tokens into play under his or her control. Treat those tokens as 1/1 green creatures.

mc.name: Llanowar Behemoth
mc.oracleText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Llanowar Behemoth gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Tap a creature you control: +1/+1 until end of turn
mc.flavorText:
"Most people can't build decent weapons out of stone or steel. Trust the elves to do it with only mud and vines."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Llanowar Druid
mc.oracleText: {T}, Sacrifice Llanowar Druid: Untap all Forests.
mc.printedText: {T}, Sacrifice Llanowar Druid: Untap all forests.
mc.flavorText:
"This forest means more to the druids than their own kin. The loss of a tree is like the loss of a child."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Llanowar Sentinel
mc.oracleText: When Llanowar Sentinel comes into play, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentinel and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: When Llanowar Sentinel comes into play, you may pay {1}{G} to search your library for a Llanowar Sentinel card. Put that card into play. Shuffle your library afterwards.
mc.flavorText:
"The forest has as many eyes as leaves."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Mwonvuli Ooze
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay {2} for each age counter on it.)
Mwonvuli Ooze's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus twice the number of age counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {2}
Mwonvuli Ooze has power and toughness each equal to 1 plus its last paid cumulative upkeep.
mc.flavorText: "Ewww"

mc.name: Nature's Kiss
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
{1}, Remove the top card in your graveyard from the game: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {1}, Remove the top card in your graveyard from the game: Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"I cradle my rage even as the earth cradles my dead kin."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Nature's Resurgence
mc.oracleText: Each player draws a card for each creature card in his or her graveyard.
mc.printedText: Each player draws a number of cards equal to the number of creature cards in his or her graveyard.
mc.flavorText:
Spring follows winter
--Elvish expression meaning
"all things pass"

mc.name: Redwood Treefolk
mc.flavorText:
"In the heart of Llanowar the magic is so strong that trees cannot stay rooted."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Rogue Elephant
mc.oracleText: When Rogue Elephant comes into play, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.
mc.printedText: When Rogue Elephant comes into play, sacrifice a forest or bury Rogue Elephant.
mc.flavorText:
"When are trees like grass?"
--The One Thousand Questions

mc.name: Striped Bears
mc.oracleText: When Striped Bears comes into play, draw a card.
mc.printedText: When Striped Bears comes into play, draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"The bear is never cautious--which is why it wasn't born a human."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Sylvan Hierophant
mc.oracleText: When Sylvan Hierophant is put into a graveyard from play, remove Sylvan Hierophant from the game, then return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: If Sylvan Hierophant is put into any graveyard from play, remove Sylvan Hierophant from the game, then return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

mc.name: Tranquil Grove
mc.oracleText: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.
mc.printedText: {1}{G}{G}: Destroy all other enchantments.
mc.flavorText:
"Even the fiercest storm has a peaceful eye."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Uktabi Efreet
mc.oracleText: Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
mc.printedText: Cumulative upkeep {G}
mc.flavorText:
"The Uktabi efreet and I have something in common: both of our mothers wanted to give us back."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Veteran Explorer
mc.oracleText: When Veteran Explorer is put into a graveyard from play, each player may search his or her library for up to two basic land cards and put them into play. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.
mc.printedText: If Veteran Explorer is put into any graveyard from play, each player may search his or her library for up to two basic land cards and put those lands into play. Each player shuffles his or her library afterwards.

mc.name: Vitalize
mc.oracleText: Untap all creatures you control.
mc.printedText: Untap all creatures you control.
mc.flavorText:
"After waking to the magic of Llanowar, no dreams can compare."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: ther Flash
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature comes into play, ther Flash deals 2 damage to it.
mc.printedText: Whenever any creature comes into play, Aether Flash deals 2 damage to that creature.
mc.flavorText:
"You can't get there from here. Well, you can--it just won't be fun."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Betrothed of Fire
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Sacrifice an untapped creature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Sacrifice enchanted creature: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
mc.printedText:
Sacrifice an untapped creature: Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Sacrifice enchanted creature: All creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Bloodrock Cyclops
mc.oracleText: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each turn if able.
mc.printedText: Bloodrock Cyclops attacks each turn if able.
mc.flavorText:
"He's big an' dumb an' ready to fight. A lot like ol' Hornhead here."
--Squee, goblin cabin hand,
scouting report

mc.name: Bogardan Firefiend
mc.oracleText: When Bogardan Firefiend is put into a graveyard from play, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
mc.printedText: If Bogardan Firefiend is put into any graveyard from play, it deals 2 damage to target creature.
mc.flavorText:
"The next one who tells me to relax and curl up by a fire is dead."
--Mirri of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Boiling Blood
mc.oracleText:
Target creature attacks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature attacks this turn if able.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
Your father has no horns
Your mother wears a bell
You drink the milk of goats
--Talruum taunts

mc.name: Cinder Giant
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, Cinder Giant deals 2 damage to each other creature you control.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, Cinder Giant deals 2 damage to each other creature you control.
mc.flavorText:
"The giant wept tears of embers for the deaths of his allies."
--Azeworai, "The Lonely Giant"

mc.name: Cinder Wall
mc.oracleText:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
mc.printedText: If Cinder Wall blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
mc.flavorText:
"Easy. All ya gotta do is push somebody into it."
--Squee, goblin cabin hand,
scouting report

mc.name: Cone of Flame
mc.oracleText: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.
mc.printedText: Choose three target creatures and/or players. Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to the first, 2 damage to the second, and 3 damage to the third.
mc.flavorText:
"Mine is not the warmth of compassion."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Desperate Gambit
mc.oracleText: Choose a source you control and flip a coin. If you win the flip, the next time that source would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead. If you lose the flip, the next time it would deal damage this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText: Flip a coin; target opponent calls heads or tails while coin is in the air. If the flip ends up in your favor, double the damage dealt by a source you control. Otherwise, prevent all damage from that source.

mc.name: Dwarven Berserker
mc.oracleText: Whenever Dwarven Berserker becomes blocked, it gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.printedText: If Dwarven Berserker is blocked, it gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: "I may be small, but I can kick your butt."

mc.name: Dwarven Thaumaturgist
mc.oracleText: {T}: Switch target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
mc.printedText: {T}: Switch power and toughness of target creature until end of turn. Effects that alter that creature's power alter its toughness instead, and vice versa, until end of turn.

mc.name: Fervor
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have haste.
mc.printedText: All creatures you control are unaffected by summoning sickness.
mc.flavorText:
"If your blood doesn't run hot, I will make it run in the sands"
--Maraxus of Keld

mc.name: Fire Whip
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
mc.printedText:
Play only on a creature you control.
Tap enchanted creature: Enchanted creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Sacrifice Fire Whip: Fire Whip deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

mc.name: Firestorm
mc.oracleText:
As an additional cost to play Firestorm, discard X cards.
Firestorm deals X damage to each of X target creatures and/or players.
mc.printedText: Choose and discard X cards: Firestorm deals X damage to each of X target creatures and/or players.
mc.flavorText:
"Glok loved storms He'd sit an' watch an' laugh through the whole thing. I miss him."
--Squee, goblin cabin hand

mc.name: Fit of Rage
mc.oracleText: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.printedText: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains first strike until end of turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Anger is fleeting; remorse is eternal."
--Karn, silver golem

mc.name: Goblin Bomb
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a fuse counter on Goblin Bomb. If you lose the flip, remove a fuse counter from Goblin Bomb.
Remove five fuse counters from Goblin Bomb, Sacrifice Goblin Bomb: Goblin Bomb deals 20 damage to target player.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, you may choose to flip a coin. Target opponent calls heads or tails while the coin is in the air. If the flip ends up in your favor, put a fuse counter on Goblin Bomb. Otherwise, remove a fuse counter from Goblin Bomb.
Remove 5 fuse counters from Goblin Bomb, Sacrifice Goblin Bomb: Goblin Bomb deals 20 damage to target player.

mc.name: Goblin Grenadiers
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Grenadiers attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, destroy target creature and target land.
mc.printedText: Sacrifice Goblin Grenadiers: Destroy target creature and target land. Use this ability only if Goblin Grenadiers is attacking and unblocked.
mc.flavorText: For once, Squee realized, he wasn't the dumb one.

mc.name: Goblin Vandal
mc.oracleText: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.printedText: {R}: Destroy target artifact defending player controls. Goblin Vandal deals no combat damage this turn. Use this ability only if Goblin Vandal is attacking and unblocked and only once each turn.

mc.name: Heart of Bogardan
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep isn't paid, it deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls, where X is twice the number of age counters on Heart of Bogardan minus two.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {2}
If Heart of Bogardan's cumulative upkeep cost is not paid, Heart of Bogardan deals damage equal to its last paid cumulative upkeep to target player and each creature he or she controls.

mc.name: Heat Stroke
mc.oracleText: At end of combat, destroy each creature that blocked or was blocked this turn.
mc.printedText: At the end of each combat, destroy all creatures that blocked or were blocked this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"Stroke of heat or stroke of blade. Choose your fate, traitor."
--Maraxus of Keld, to Starke

mc.name: Hurloon Shaman
mc.oracleText: When Hurloon Shaman is put into a graveyard from play, each player sacrifices a land.
mc.printedText: If Hurloon Shaman is put into any graveyard from play, each player chooses and buries a land he or she controls.
mc.flavorText:
"I believe it when they say they're connected to the land--looks like somebody plowed her face."
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Lava Hounds
mc.oracleText:
Haste
When Lava Hounds comes into play, it deals 4 damage to you.
mc.printedText:
Lava Hounds is unaffected by summoning sickness.
When Lava Hounds comes into play, it deals 4 damage to you.
mc.flavorText:
What cats bury, dogs eat.
--Urborg aphorism

mc.name: Lava Storm
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature; or Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each blocking creature.
mc.printedText: Lava Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature or 2 damage to each blocking creature.
mc.flavorText: They say lava conquers all.

mc.name: Maraxus of Keld
mc.oracleText: Maraxus of Keld's power and toughness are each equal to the number of untapped artifacts, creatures, and lands you control.
mc.printedText: Maraxus of Keld has power and toughness each equal to the total number of untapped artifacts, creatures, and lands you control.
mc.flavorText:
"I have no master. I am chaos."
--Maraxus of Keld

mc.name: Orcish Settlers
mc.oracleText: {X}{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orcish Settlers: Destroy X target lands.
mc.printedText: {X}{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Orcish Settlers: Destroy X target lands.
mc.flavorText: They wouldn't know their house from a charred hole in the ground.

mc.name: Roc Hatchling
mc.oracleText:
Roc Hatchling comes into play with four shell counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a shell counter from Roc Hatchling.
Roc Hatchling gets +3/+2 and has flying as long as it has no shell counters on it.
mc.printedText:
When Roc Hatchling comes into play, put four shell counters on it.
During your upkeep, remove a shell counter from Roc Hatchling.
As long as Roc Hatchling has no shell counters on it, it gets +3/+2 and gains flying.

mc.name: Sawtooth Ogre
mc.oracleText: Whenever Sawtooth Ogre blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Sawtooth Ogre deals 1 damage to that creature at end of combat.
mc.printedText: If Sawtooth Ogre blocks or is blocked by any creature, Sawtooth Ogre deals 1 damage to that creature at end of combat.
mc.flavorText: "You will sharpen your teeth on my enemies' bones," Maraxus promised them, and his ogres cheered.

mc.name: Thunderbolt
mc.oracleText: Choose one - Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player; or Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.printedText: Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mc.flavorText:
"Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Thundermare
mc.oracleText:
Haste (This creature can attack the turn it comes under your control.)
When Thundermare comes into play, tap all other creatures.
mc.printedText:
Thundermare is unaffected by summoning sickness.
When Thundermare comes into play, tap all other creatures.
mc.flavorText: Its hooves strike lightning and the thunder follows quickly after.

mc.name: Abeyance
mc.oracleText:
Until end of turn, target player can't play instants, sorceries, or activated abilities that aren't mana abilities.
Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Until end of turn, target player cannot play instants, interrupts, sorceries, or abilities requiring an activation cost.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"I'm too modest a wizard to reveal the full extent of my abilities."
--Ertai, wizard adept

mc.name: Alabaster Dragon
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Alabaster Dragon is put into a graveyard from play, shuffle Alabaster Dragon into its owner's library.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If Alabaster Dragon is put into any graveyard from play, shuffle Alabaster Dragon into its owner's library.

mc.name: Alms
mc.oracleText: {1}, Remove the top card in your graveyard from the game: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
mc.printedText: {1}, Remove the top card in your graveyard from the game: Prevent 1 damage to any creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Helping people is mostly a matter of teaching them to help themselves."
--Sisay, journal

mc.name: Angelic Renewal
mc.oracleText: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from play, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to play.
mc.printedText: If any creatures are put into your graveyard from play, you may bury Angelic Renewal and put one of those creatures into play.

mc.name: Ardent Militia
mc.oracleText: Vigilance
mc.printedText: Attacking does not cause Ardent Militia to tap.
mc.flavorText:
"While the rest of us got paid to serve the Benalish army, the militia didn't. I used to say they stood for freedom--free and dumb."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Argivian Find
mc.oracleText: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.printedText: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"We often bury our pasts, and then someone comes along and digs them up."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Aura of Silence
mc.oracleText:
Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents play cost {2} more to play.
Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
mc.printedText:
Artifact and enchantment spells cost target opponent an additional {2} to play.
Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mc.name: Benalish Infantry
mc.oracleText: Banding
mc.printedText: Banding
mc.flavorText:
"My favorite part of getting into the infantry was getting out again."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Benalish Knight
mc.oracleText:
Flash (You may play this spell any time you could play an instant.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
mc.printedText:
First strike
You may play Benalish Knight whenever you could play an instant.
mc.flavorText:
"We called them --'armored lightning.'"
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Benalish Missionary
mc.oracleText: {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.
mc.printedText: {1}{W}, {T}: Target blocked creature deals no combat damage this turn.
mc.flavorText:
"These horn-haters say no gods but theirs exist. I say let him find out for himself--right now"
--Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Debt of Loyalty
mc.oracleText: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way this turn.
mc.printedText: Regenerate target creature. Gain control of that creature.
mc.flavorText: "I killed him because I had to," Starke lied to Gerrard. "But now I pledge my loyalty to you."

mc.name: Duskrider Falcon
mc.oracleText: Flying, protection from black
mc.printedText: Flying, protection from black
mc.flavorText:
"Seaborne ships have their dolphins to dance in their wakes; I have my duskriders."
--Sisay, journal

mc.name: Empyrial Armor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
mc.printedText: Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
mc.flavorText:
"An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire."
--"Hymn of Angelfire"

mc.name: Foriysian Brigade
mc.oracleText: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature.
mc.printedText: Foriysian Brigade may block two creatures each combat. (All blocking assignments must still be legal.)
mc.flavorText:
"A double-edged sword lets you cut down your enemies with the backswing as well."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
mc.oracleText: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
mc.printedText: For each card in your hand, gain 2 life.
mc.flavorText:
"Fighting without an army is called a duel, and you'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Guided Strike
mc.oracleText:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

Draw a card.
mc.printedText:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
mc.flavorText:
"If you can kill your enemy with the first stroke, you save yourself the labor of the second."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Heavy Ballista
mc.oracleText: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.printedText: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
mc.flavorText:
"Archers, ballistae--you can't even get near the island of Avenant."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Inner Sanctum
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep-Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep--2 life
All damage dealt to creatures you control is reduced to 0.
mc.flavorText: "Save me from Maraxus," Starke pleaded, "or condemn me to his wrath. Either way, do not ignore me"

mc.name: Kithkin Armor
mc.oracleText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Sacrifice Kithkin Armor: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to enchanted creature this turn, prevent that damage.
mc.printedText:
Enchanted creature cannot be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.
Sacrifice Kithkin Armor: Prevent all damage to enchanted creature from one source.

mc.name: Master of Arms
mc.oracleText:
First strike
{1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms. Prevent all combat damage that creature would deal this turn.
mc.printedText:
First strike
{1}{W}: Tap target creature blocking Master of Arms.
mc.flavorText:
"Being the best usually means proving it to everyone."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Mistmoon Griffin
mc.oracleText:
Flying
When Mistmoon Griffin is put into a graveyard from play, remove Mistmoon Griffin from the game, then return the top creature card from your graveyard to play.
mc.printedText:
Flying
If Mistmoon Griffin is put into any graveyard from play, remove Mistmoon Griffin from the game, then put the top creature card from your graveyard into play.

mc.name: Peacekeeper
mc.oracleText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Peacekeeper unless you pay {1}{W}.
Creatures can't attack.
mc.printedText:
During your upkeep, pay {1}{W} or bury Peacekeeper.
Creatures cannot attack.
mc.flavorText:
"I have always imagined my mother as such a woman, strong and wise."
--Sisay, journal

mc.name: Revered Unicorn
mc.oracleText:
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When Revered Unicorn leaves play, its controller gains life equal to the number of age counters on it.
mc.printedText:
Cumulative upkeep {1}
If Revered Unicorn leaves play, its controller gains life equal to Revered Unicorn's last paid cumulative upkeep.
mc.flavorText:
"I felt unworthy even to dream of it."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Serenity
mc.oracleText: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all artifacts and enchantments. They can't be regenerated.
mc.printedText: During your upkeep, bury all artifacts and enchantments.
mc.flavorText:
"Just think of me as the storm before the calm."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Serra's Blessing
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control have vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)
mc.printedText: Attacking does not cause creatures you control to tap.
mc.flavorText:
"I have seen your strength imbued in angels' wings, and I have felt your sorrow rain down on the ruins brought by the Lord of the Wastes."
--Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

mc.name: Soul Shepherd
mc.oracleText: {W}, Remove a creature card in your graveyard from the game: You gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: {W}, Remove a creature card in your graveyard from the game: Gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText:
"The sidar who raised me had a saying: --'The first step into death is the hardest.'"
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Southern Paladin
mc.oracleText: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.
mc.printedText: {W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target red permanent.
mc.flavorText:
"Look to the south; there you will find peace and serenity."
--The Book of Tal

mc.name: Tariff
mc.oracleText: Each player sacrifices the creature he or she controls with the highest converted mana cost unless he or she pays that creature's mana cost. If two creatures a player controls are tied for highest cost, that player chooses one.
mc.printedText: Each player chooses a creature with the highest total casting cost he or she controls, then pays an amount of mana equal to that creature's total casting cost or buries the creature.

mc.name: Volunteer Reserves
mc.oracleText:
Banding
Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
mc.printedText:
Banding
Cumulative upkeep {1}
mc.flavorText:
"I'm always a little leery of anyone who offers to kill other people for free."
--Gerrard of the Weatherlight

mc.name: Gemstone Mine
mc.oracleText:
Gemstone Mine comes into play with three mining counters on it.
{T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.
mc.printedText:
When Gemstone Mine comes into play, put three mining counters on it.
{T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, bury it.

mc.name: Lotus Vale
mc.oracleText:
If Lotus Vale would come into play, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Lotus Vale into play. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.

{T}: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
When Lotus Vale comes into play, sacrifice two untapped lands or bury Lotus Vale.
{T}: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool.
mc.flavorText: At what price beauty?

mc.name: Scorched Ruins
mc.oracleText:
If Scorched Ruins would come into play, sacrifice two untapped lands instead. If you do, put Scorched Ruins into play. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard.

{T}: Add {4} to your mana pool.
mc.printedText:
When Scorched Ruins comes into play, sacrifice two untapped lands or bury Scorched Ruins.
{T}: Add four colorless mana to your mana pool.

mc.name: Winding Canyons
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may play creature cards as though they had flash.
mc.printedText:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: Until end of turn, you may play creature cards whenever you could play instants.
